abstract: Showtime announces deal with Bell Media to bring its brand to Canada, first time network's programming will be distributed and marketed outside United States under its brand.
lead_paragraph: It will be the first time Showtime’s programming will be distributed and marketed under the Showtime umbrella outside the United States.
snippet: It will be the first time Showtime’s programming will be distributed and marketed under the Showtime umbrella outside the United States.

headline.main: Showtime Plans a Global Push, Starting With a Canadian Deal
headline.print_headline: Showtime Plans a Global Push, Starting With a Canadian Deal
